name: Wanna Be My Bae
description:
Wanna Be My Bae is a game about a guy who does everything to make his girlfriend happy, he wash the dishes, he makes her food, he take care of her cats, and more.

Try to be him and don't let your bae get mad with you.

Controls: 

Arrow Keys (especifically left and right) and Spacebar to interact with the environment.

Thanks for playing. Everything by me except for sound effects (wich is kinda hard to make to be honest xD).
